Featured Projects

Michigan Covid-19 Dashboard

Worked as a project manager, recruiter, and software tester to help get a Covid-19 dashboard up and running for the Michigan Governors office. Collaborated with students, professors and admins from the University of Michigan School of Information + School of Public Policy as well as Ford Motor Company

Check it out

GoNana's Brand and Asset Creation

Worked with a team of graphic designers, UX designers, and marketing students to come up with a brand identity for GoNana's packaging as well as animations for their website
